alert.note: Alert for Beaverhead and Western Madison below 6000ft; Canyon Ferry Area; Gallatin Valley; Madison River Valley; Missouri Headwaters; Ruby Mountains and Southern Beaverhead Mountains (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued October 23 at 1:12PM MDT until October 25 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TUESDAY NIGHT TO 6 PM MDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations 2 to 6 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Portions of central and southwest Montana. * WHEN...From Midnight Tuesday Night to 6 PM MDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Wednesday morning and evening commutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website.
